documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: Air ticket policies do not support indefinite carry-over of unused balances between renewal cycles. Unused ticket allowances expire at the end of each policy renewal period.
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Customers must carefully plan air ticket allocations for multi-year policies. For a 5-year cycle with 5 annual requests, total requests must be set to 25 (5 × 5). Unused tickets do not roll forward.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Calculate total requests by multiplying annual request needs by the number of years in the renewal cycle. Set this total in the policy configuration.
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Air Ticket Policy Configuration > Renewal Cycles and Request Allocation

documentation_candidates.summary: Air tickets - Booked tickets notification (tagging LM when not in approval flow OR workflow on ticket requests)
documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: The platform cannot notify or tag line managers about air ticket processing when they are outside the standard approval workflow. There is no automated notification system for proxy requesters or managers raising requests for employees.
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Line managers who raise air ticket requests on behalf of employees cannot track completion status or receive notifications when tickets are booked, creating visibility gaps in request management.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Ensure line managers are included in the approval workflow to receive notifications. Alternatively, use email or manual communication channels to inform line managers of ticket processing status.
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Air Ticket Requests > Notifications and Tracking for Line Managers

documentation_candidates.summary: As an employee I want to manage my air ticket requests from my air tickets
documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: The platform does not provide a unified interface for employees to manage air ticket requests across different policy conditions (inactive policies, missing hire/probation dates, varied eligibility states).
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Employees cannot independently manage air ticket requests when policies are inactive, employee records are incomplete, or eligibility criteria are not met. HR intervention may be required.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Contact HR or admin to verify policy status, complete employee records (hire date, probation end date), and confirm eligibility before managing air ticket requests.
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Air Ticket Management > Employee Self-Service Limitations

documentation_candidates.summary: Letter requests - upload the document after stamping
documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: The platform does not support external document signing workflows for letter requests. Approved letter requests cannot be modified, have attachments added, or be returned to pending status for re-upload of signed documents.
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Organizations requiring external document stamping or attestation cannot use the letter request feature for this purpose. Approved requests are locked and cannot be modified, preventing post-approval document uploads.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Complete all document signing and attestation before submitting the letter request for approval. Use external document management systems for stamped/attested documents and share via email outside the platform.
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Letter Requests > External Signing and Attestation Workflows

documentation_candidates.summary: Need to delete the test air tickets processed
documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: Once air ticket expense entries are processed, the platform provides no mechanism to delete or reverse them. Processed air tickets are permanent and cannot be removed through the UI.
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Users must be extremely careful during air ticket data entry, as processed entries cannot be removed. Test or erroneous data cannot be cleaned up after processing, potentially polluting expense records.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Avoid processing test or dummy air ticket entries. Verify all air ticket data before processing. Contact support for backend assistance if processed entries must be removed.
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Work Expenses > Air Ticket Management > Processed Expense Handling

documentation_candidates.summary: Restricted People manager role - can still see other employees (out of assigned group)
documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: Employee group restrictions are inconsistently applied across platform modules. People Manager and Adjustment Manager roles can view and edit employees outside their assigned groups in HR and document modules, even when grouping is enabled.
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Organizations cannot enforce comprehensive role-based access control across all modules. People Managers and Adjustment Managers can access employee data outside their assigned groups, creating potential data privacy and organizational control issues.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Implement additional access controls outside the platform or use alternative role assignments that do not rely on employee grouping for HR module restrictions.
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Employee Groups and Role Restrictions > Module-Specific Limitations
